entities.name: women
entities.description: A general term for female characters in the story.

relationships.description: Harry and Cho were together at some point before she left him.
Cho mentioned Cedric to Harry, causing tension between them.
Harry was planning to meet Hermione at the Three Broomsticks.
Harry met Hagrid at the Three Broomsticks.
